WorkItem.Description:
I have a requirement of fetching of test cases (manual) , which are created in VSTS along with their execution result status. For ex. the number of test cases passed, failed or Blocked. 
Also I need to show the consolidated aggregate list of test cases based on their priority and their status. All this I need with a button click from Excel using VBScript. Could any one help me achieving this.
WorkItem.Summary: Fetching Test Result data from TFS to Excel using VBScript
